headline: Fowler scores 39 to lift Sacramento St. over Montana 72-71
author: The Associated Press

Trialing by three, 72-69, Lonnell Martin Jr. missed a 3-point attempt with four seconds left for Montana, but drew a foul.
(AP) â€” Bryce Fowler had a career-high 39 points as Sacramento State held off Montana 72-71 on Saturday night.
He hit the first two free throws to pull the Grizzlies within a point, but missed the third.
William FitzPatrick had 17 points for Sacramento State (10-17, 6-14 Big Sky Conference).
Josh Bannan had 20 points and 15 rebounds for the Grizzlies (18-13, 11-9).
The Hornets leveled the season series against the Grizzlies.
Montana defeated Sacramento State 65-58 on Dec. 2.
Cameron Wilbon added 10 points and 11 rebounds.
Fowler converted all 10 of his free throws.
